channel.title: lockdown on Stupid Things
channel.description: Recent content in lockdown on Stupid Things

item.title: What a bunch of Kents
item.description: As I write this, the world has gone through is in the throws of a global viral pandemic. How humanity comes out the otherside is a matter of pure speculation. The only thing that I know, is that if this doesn’t change how our society works, I’m not sure what will. This blog isn’t about SARS-CoV-2 (the virus responsible for the current state of affairs for future readers). It’s about running, hills and adventures on whatever scale you can manage them.
